body: On the construction one pretty much wife is left in charge of a workplace, but there is an accident and the worker who get's hurt starts to make a fuzz and demand money and a bunch of stuff for his injuries, like having the wife + husband fired. The wife goes over to try and make him redraw his claims and lawsuit. The guy demands at least 30 mil yen, she say's it's impossible to pay that amount but offers to help him til he's okey again. Guy say's his right hand is hurt so he can't jerk of again and demands her to take care of it. His demands keeps escalating til the last part where he pretty much tells her she's gonna become his wife in the future and he will fuck her every single day when she does. Wife sits crying in the shower saying she's sorry to her husband but since she's stupid this is the only way she knows how to fix this...the end
Dissapointing there wasnt more to that construction story. Feel like there was more than 2 chapters that couldve been told.
finna drop ropes with this one bruh
